channel.title: A very special thank you. (from Xavior / IVO)
channel.description:
[A VERY SPECIAL THANK YOU!](https://soundcloud.com/xaviormusic/omnipotent-vip)
I felt the need to acknowledge those who have given me continuous support from the moment I started posting my music and the creators and developers of Auxy Music Studio who gave me the tools to express myself the ways I've always wanted. It's a bit of a cliche to call it a musical journey, but that's exactly what it has been, and a thrilling one at that. Never did I believe that I would be able to develop the skills that would allow me to produce and release tracks like this. The first time I released 'Omnipotent', I knew that I had found my niche. It took time to get to the point where I could feel totally confident in what I'm able to create, and even so I know that there's room for improvement, yet I'm never discouraged. I've been so humbled and honored over the past couple of years, and I only hope to keep sharing with you one of my deepest, must honest passions. So, in the one way I can truly show you, I give my very special, sincere, *Thank You*!

item.title: A very special thank you. (from Xavior / IVO)
item.dc:creator: davidnaha
item.description:
dude it’s so crazy(in a good way) that we all get to connect like this here… I mean Auxy was made and then here we are, few folks with similar goals who LOVE to make some unique tunes and I’m glad Auxy made that happen in a way. It’s getting bigger imo and brings more and more people closer to accomplishing their dreams and stuffs.

so yeah I think I get an idea of what you’re saying because I feel somewhat the same way of having this beautiful gift I guess…

I’m glad you’re a part of all this man and I’m sure the rest of us feel the same for each other!

Cheers,

David

Read full topic

item.source: A very special thank you. (from Xavior / IVO)

item.title: A very special thank you. (from Xavior / IVO)
item.dc:creator: xavior
item.description:
It always brings me so much joy to hear that I can inspire another artist to make music! If there’s anything that matters to me about music, it’s being able to share these stories and expressions and giving others the confidence to do the same!

P.S. The explicit music has always been a bit of a stunt. Never liked being told what I can and can’t put out (especially just because it happens to be shared with members of a community that don’t really appreciate the unique approach and effort, but are instead too focused on sounding like others to get the most amount of likes and reposts). But sometimes a bad word speaks volumes more, so don’t be surprised if those appear in future releases

Read full topic
item.source: A very special thank you. (from Xavior / IVO)
